name_original: winter Snow hill Bus Driving simulator
description:
winter Snow Hil Climb Bus driving simulator 2016

From each other by mountain climbing adventure race level is waiting for you!
This Snow Hill Bus Drive give you the chance to become a pro driver of the winter bus on the slope snow.
You need to act fast and drive carefully in the hazardous weather of snowstorm and snowfall.
Hilltop bus driving are experts in cutting those curvy hilly corners but snow blizzards and land sliding adds to the real risk and challenge.
Winter Snow bus is a challenging game and you can test your driving skills in risky and dangerous conditions and difficult snowy paths.
Snowy mountains are extremely slippery and covered with a thick blanket of snow during winter season and get the real feel of nature.
It’s a survival game, so play as the extreme highland bus driver to fulfil the duty .
Face the challenges of unique mount climbing environments with many different buses. Gain bonuses from daring tricks and collect coins to upgrade your bus and reach even higher distances.

Drive and climb throughout different scenarios. Change your Bug and get a new gaming experience.

key features:

Amazing Hill Station and with heavy snow 3D Graphics.

Smooth Steering, Brakes and Drifting

Explore city and hilly with heavy snow

Smooth touch controls for easy driving
